welcome.title: Welcome to OpenSchool.ai!
welcome.description: Let's quickly get acquainted with our platform. It will only take a minute!

features.title: Platform Features
features.description: OpenSchool.ai is a comprehensive educational platform with AI assistants for teachers, students, and parents.

getStarted.title: Start Right Now
getStarted.description:
"Start Free" - self registration
"Via School" - registration with school code

hasAccount.title: Already Have an Account?
hasAccount.description: If you are already registered, click "Login" to access your dashboard.

welcome.title: Welcome to the Student Dashboard!
welcome.description: Let's explore the main features. You can always return to this tour through settings.

navigation.title: Section Navigation
navigation.description:
Here are all the main sections:
Dashboard - overview of your progress
AI Chat - ask questions to the assistant
Schedule - your lessons
Journal - grades and attendance
Planning - learning plan
Assignments - homework

dashboard.title: Dashboard - Main Page
dashboard.description: Here you see overall statistics: average grade, progress by subject, and upcoming assignments.

chat.title: AI Assistant Chat
chat.description: Ask questions about homework, request explanations for difficult topics, or ask for help with problems.

assignments.title: Assignments
assignments.description: View all your homework assignments, submit completed work, and receive feedback from your teacher.

energy.title: Energy
energy.description: Each question to the AI assistant consumes energy. Energy restores daily or you can get unlimited with a Pro subscription.

profile.title: Profile and Settings
profile.description: Here you can change profile settings, view achievements, and manage your subscription.

welcome.title: Welcome to the Teacher Dashboard!
welcome.description: Let's explore the tools. You can always return to this tour through settings.

categories.title: Tool Categories
categories.description:
All tools are organized by categories:
Planning - lesson plans, learning objectives
Creation - tests, questions, materials
Support - student assistance
Teaching - discussions, assessments
Students - student management

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Here are all AI tools for work: assignment generation, work checking, test creation, and much more.

search.title: Tool Search
search.description: Use search to quickly find the tool you need among dozens available.

students.title: Student Management
students.description: In the "Students" tab, you can manage your student list, view their progress, and communicate with them.

discipline.title: Discipline Selection
discipline.description: Switch between disciplines to work with different subjects and student groups.

profile.title: Teacher Profile
profile.description: Manage profile settings, view statistics, and configure notifications.

welcome.title: Welcome to the Parent Dashboard!
welcome.description: Let's explore the features. You can always return to this tour through settings.

childSelector.title: Child Selector
childSelector.description: If you have multiple children, switch between them here.

quickStats.title: Quick Stats
quickStats.description: Here you see overall statistics of the selected child's performance: average grade, attendance, and activity.

teacherList.title: Teacher List
teacherList.description: List of all your child's teachers. Click on a teacher to open a chat with them.

aiChat.title: AI Assistant Chat
aiChat.description: Ask questions about your child's performance, get learning recommendations, and help with homework.

quickQuestions.title: Quick Questions
quickQuestions.description: Ready-made questions for quick information: progress, attendance, homework.
